Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window

            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • a2.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class GUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame

    Create and Show GUI

    The class GUI creates the GUI and shows it. ActionListeners are added to relevant GUI components. For thread safety, an instance of this class should be invoked from the event-dispatching thread.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Melanie Howard
    See Also:

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void createMenu()
      This method creates the menuBar, adds menuItems, adds their MenuActionListeners and maps keyEvents to them.
      private void createToolPanel()
      This method creates the toolPanel and toolButtons, to which it adds ToolButtonListeners.
      private void setupCanvas()
      This method sets the canvas instance of CanvasPanel, adds mouseListeners, mouseMotionListeners, and adds it to the mainPanel

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        public GUI()
        Constructor for the GUI class. This method is used to set up the JFrame, add menu, canvas and toolPanel created in other methods, as well as the mainPanel and display the window.

    • Method Detail

      • createMenu

        private void createMenu()
        This method creates the menuBar, adds menuItems, adds their MenuActionListeners and maps keyEvents to them. The menuBar is set in the JFrame.

      • setupCanvas

        private void setupCanvas()
        This method sets the canvas instance of CanvasPanel, adds mouseListeners, mouseMotionListeners, and adds it to the mainPanel

      • createToolPanel

        private void createToolPanel()
        This method creates the toolPanel and toolButtons, to which it adds ToolButtonListeners. The toolPanel is added to the mainPanel.
